post:
[Hostodo.com]("http://hostodo.com") offers simple, easy to use shared hosting for personal websites and professional businesses alike. We are run by a team of IT professionals with years of experience. Unsure? We have a 30 day money back guarantee for all of our clients, so there's nothing to worry about!   
  
 
If you have any questions about our services, feel free to open a ticket at: https://hostodo.com/portal/contact.php  
  

**Features**

- cPanel Control Panel  
- CloudFlare Certified Partner
- DDoS Protection
- Unlimited FTP Accounts
- Unlimited Email Accounts
- Unlimited SQL Databases
- Unlimited Subdomains
- Instant Set Up
- Softaculous 
- Daily Remote Backups
- Hosted in New York City 


**Plans:   
======**

**Bronze**  
- 15GB SSD Cached Disk Space  
- 150GB Monthly Bandwidth  
- 10 Addon/Parked Domains  
- DDoS Protection  
- $5.00 per year  
- Promocode: LETYEARLY  
  
**[[Order Now]]("https://hostodo.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&promocode=LETYEARLY")**  
  
  
**Silver**  
- 25GB SSD Cached Disk Space  
- 300GB Monthly Bandwidth  
- 10 Addon/Parked Domains    
- DDoS Protection  
- $7.00 per year  
- Promocode: LETYEARLY-SILV    
  
**[[Order Now]](https://hostodo.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=2&promocode=LETYEARLY-SILV)**  
   
**Gold**  
- 50GB SSD Cached Disk Space  
- 500GB Monthly Bandwidth  
- 25 Addon/Parked Domains  
- DDoS Protection  
- $1.50 per month  
- Promocode: LET-GOLD  
  
**[[Order Now]](https://hostodo.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=3&promocode=LET-GOLD)**  
  
Dedicated IP Addresses are available for an additional 1.99 per month. DDoS protected dedicated IP addresses are available at $5 per month.  
  
[Domains]("https://hostodo.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&domain=register") are available starting at $8.99/year.    
  
**Contact Us**  
You can contact us by:  
1) Submitting a ticket: https://hostodo.com/portal/contact.php  
2) LiveChat  
3) Call us! 855-738-7326
